title: Personal Statement
text:
My sincerest desire to become a Professor of Computer Science growing up with deep and sound knowledge of Mathematics right from my elementary school to high school has really helped me to enjoy and be very delightful in solving complex problems. This has been my dream and driving force behind my chosen field of career which led to my keen interest in studying computer science, ways of logical processing and complex problem solving.
In pursuing computer science I have been fascinated by technologies in general and computers in particular from the beginning. In fact, I quickly picked up interest in programming/software development starting with DOS, QBasic, FORTRAN, COBOL, Pascal, C-language etc as soon as I got admission into high institution.
In furthering my keen desire for computer science, I am having a Master in Social Data Analytics and Research from University of Texas at Dallas in view. I had Master in Business Computing (2018) from University of Ibadan – Nigeria.  To complement my business knowledge and exposure, and develop and manage a robust financial application, I had Master of Business Administration – (2008) from Ladoke Akintola University of Technology – Nigeria. Prior to Master degrees, I graduated with Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Science (2008) from Lagos State University, Nigeria. I graduated from Computer science (2001) major with degree from Yaba College of Technology, Nigeria where I began my Computer Science journey. I am Chartered IT Professional and a Member of Computer Professionals (Registration Council of Nigeria) and a Fellow of Nigeria Computer Society (NCS). I am also a Member of Association for Computing Machinery.
My working career gave me opportunity to develop strategies, oversee the design, development and implementation of major systems initiatives, manage and oversee multiple, concurrent and often disparate tasks for projects involving innovative software applications and highly complex system integration.
I am a dynamic and seasoned IT professional with cognate work experience gained through several developed & managed IT projects. I have my core competence in Software Development, Database Management and Data Science. Over the years working as an IT Professional, IT Manager and IT Consultant, I have exposure and ground knowledge in Database Management, Software development/Programming, System Analysis & Design, System Auditing, Networking, Web Designing/development, Information/Computer Security, and Business Continuity & Disaster Recovery Management. Some of the Software I built and in use are Accounting Management System, Hospital Operation Management System, Sales/Procurement Management System, Facility Booking System, Financial Remittance/Reporting System, School Management System, Homecell Reports Management System, E-Billing/Revenue Management System, Membership Management Portal, Personnel & Payroll Management System.
I gladly excelled and acquired deep knowledge in this my choosing course of studies which I have partly educated my classmates, colleagues in form of tutorials, practicals, capacity building.
Upon achieving my objectives, I wish to further my dreams by continuing studies with Doctor of Philosophy - PhD (Computer Science) with focus on Data Science at University of Texas at Arlington.
Research has been an integral part of my professional development. I specialized in software development, database management and data analytics to mention a few. My history in teaching, research, and impacting IT knowledge blend well with my degrees and open doors to study further in Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in Computer Science with focus on Data Science.
In the rapidly evolving landscape of technology, I have been captivated by the power of data to drive innovation and transform industries. With a fervent desire to explore the frontiers of knowledge, I have applied for the Computer Science PhD program with a dedicated focus on Data Science. My academic journey and professional experiences have prepared me to embark on this rigorous path of research and discovery.
Whatever mind can conceive, it can achieve with strong determination and focus. Throughout my career, I have consistently delivered values and driven business objectives through the strategic applications of Information Technology. As a Software/Web Developer and Data Scientist, I have specialized in and gained significant experience in all stages of the development cycle for dynamic Software projects. My expertise extends to ASP.NET, Python, SQL Server, HTML, JavaScript, R, RStudio, Tableau, .NET Core, Crystal Report, SSRS, and various other technologies and frameworks. By leveraging these skills, I have successfully implemented innovative solutions and contributed to the growth and success of organizations.
Data Science, Big Data and Cloud computing has received a considerable development as a promising approach for delivering Information and Communication Technologies services. The profound impacts that data-driven insights can have on decision-making, efficiency, and predictive accuracy ignited a passion within me to delve deeper into this field. Intelligent big data analytic in cloud computing environment that require improvement are my areas of interest to carry out my researches and contribute to knowledge domain in helping health care Industry in early detection of chronic diseases. Advanced data analysis techniques allow for more accurate and efficient diagnoses. Machine learning algorithms assist in interpreting medical images (such as X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans), improving accuracy and reducing human error.
To prepare for the challenges of doctoral research, I have consistently sought to broaden my skills. I have engaged in advanced coursework in machine learning, statistics, and algorithm design, refining my analytical and computational abilities. Big Data is a huge volume of unstructured, semi structured and structured data which possible to analyze and mine information from large datasets.
Cloud computing is the on-demand delivery of compute power, database storage, applications, and other IT resources through a cloud services platform via the internet. With the fast development of processing, storage technologies, the sensation of the Internet, and computing resources have become cheaper, more powerful and more universally available than ever before.
Recently, I completed DevOps course with knowledge advantage in AzureDevOps and Cloud computing. Interestingly, I have four (4) different Amazon Web Services (AWS) Certifications and Azure which are good strong and secure cloud services platform, offering compute power, database storage, content delivery and other functionality to help business scale and grow in term of cloud computing.
The bottom line is that I want to be a part of this exciting field. The University of Texas at Arlington has a good reputation and has produced significant contributors to the field. A Doctor of Philosophy (Computer Science) degree from the University will avail opportunities for me and let me contribute more effectively than I have in the past.
In conclusion, I am driven by an unwavering passion for data science and its potential to reshape industries, drive innovation, and enrich our understanding of the world. A PhD in Computer Science with a focus on Data Science from University of Texas at Arlington would provide me with the ideal platform to realize these ambitions. I am excited to contribute to the ongoing research efforts at the intersection of data science and machine learning, while also nurturing a lifelong commitment to learning, collaboration, and innovation.
Thank you.
To learn more about me, please visit:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/dele-adelusi/

title: Brief Profile
text:
I am Adelusi, Bamidele Samuel, an accomplished and dedicated IT professional with a strong background in Computer Science - Software Development, Data Science, Database Administration, DevOps and Cloud Computing. Over the years, I have acquired a comprehensive educational foundation and a wealth of practical experience that enables me to contribute significantly to my Professional field. My academic journey began at Yaba College of Technology, Nigeria, where I obtained a degree in Computer Science in 2001, marking the inception of my passion for technology and innovation.
My ongoing pursuit of a Master’s degree in Social Data Analytics and Research at the University of Texas at Dallas is an evidence of my determination to stay at the forefront of technological advancements. This program is enhancing my skills in harnessing data to derive insights, enabling me to make informed decisions that bridge the gap between technology and societal needs.
My pursuit of academic excellence led me to acquire a Master’s degree in Business Computing (2018) from the University of Ibadan. This program fortified my understanding of the intersection between business operations and technology, providing me with a solid foundation in blending computational thinking with strategic decision-making.
To enhance my business intelligence and managerial skills, I completed a Master of Business Administration - MBA (2010) program at Ladoke Akintola University of Technology. This program equipped me with the necessary tools to develop and manage complex financial applications, bridging the gap between technology and business.
Prior to my Master degrees, I furthered my knowledge in Computer Science with a Post Graduate Diploma from Lagos State University. This program honed my technical expertise and solidified my understanding of core computing concepts.
My commitment to professional growth is highlighted by my membership in prestigious organizations:
Ø  I am a Fellow of Nigeria Computer Society (NCS). As a Fellow of NCS, I have been recognized for my significant contributions to the advancement of computing knowledge and practice.
Ø  I am chartered IT Professional and Member of Computer Professionals (Registration Council of Nigeria) demonstrating a commitment to ethical and professional standards in the IT industry.
Ø  I am a Member of the Association for Computing Machinery (ACM), showcases my engagement with a global community of computing professionals, fostering learning and collaboration, reflecting my dedication to upholding professional standards and contributing to the growth of the computing field.
These affiliations reflect my dedication to ethical and responsible practice, as well as my contribution to the advancement of the field.
To learn more about me, please visit:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/dele-adelusi/

title: Career
text:
Chief Technology Officer
Palton Morgan Holdings May 2021 – Date
• Provide leadership in technology for business enablement & innovation
• Define the enterprise architecture in conjunction with current and future requirements
• Deploy various Applications to support the business.
• Develop Software Applications & Database Administrations
• Implement CRM/NAV Business Central Application
• Deploy and manage AVAYA Call Center application
• Deploy and manage Staff portal, Emails etc
• Develop policies for internal IT operations to drive attainment of SLAs
• Build a competitive and agile team
• Identify and manage vendors in the delivery of contracted work
• Ensure IT projects are complete on-time, on-scope, and on-budget
• Developed IT Standards, IS Security Policies
• Etc

Cloud Solutions Architect/Chief Technology Officer
Futureplus Technologies Limited
May 2019 – May 2021
• Engage in Design and Architecture of Cloud Services (AWS & Azure)
• Engage in web and native app development as well as managing Applications in Cloud infrastructure for Azure and AWS.
• Work with Azure Synapse and proven understanding of data structure principles and data platforms and data analytics stream etc
• Develop and Support built Software Applications such as Accounts Management System, SMS Enquiry System, Staff/Report Mgt Portal etc using VB.Net, Java Script, etc
• Working and deep understanding of software and web technologies
• Advanced knowledge and experience in AWS database, MySQL, Hadoop, Aurora, Oracle • Database Administration such as administering SQL Server
• Creating project timelines for the development and deployment
• Keep up to date with latest technologies, maintain and improve enterprise and business.
• Represents the company for proposals’ presentation and meetings
• Train team members and supervise the subordinate duties/assignments
• Manage the company’s clients and other business relationship
• Good understanding of DevOps practice and culture
• Etc

plot(hatvalues(lm.fit))

title: Research
text:
I am a Master student studying Social Data Analytics and Research. My research topic is on Machine Learning for Public Healthcare.
Interests: Data Science - Machine Learning - Deep Learning, Data Analytics
Data Science and Software Development indeed play crucial roles in advancing healthcare, particularly in early disease detection and treatment. Data Analytics and Research play a significant role in the health industry by providing insights into various aspects of public health, patient behavior, healthcare utilization, and more. Incorporating data analytics and research into the health industry enables a more comprehensive understanding of the factors influencing health and healthcare delivery.
The health industry is undergoing a transformative shift, driven by the integration of software development, artificial intelligence, machine learning data analytics and research. These tools, once confined to traditional research settings, have now become essential components of healthcare delivery, policy-making, and disease prevention. Data analytics and research have ushered in a new era of evidence-based decision-making, personalized treatment approaches, and proactive health management.
Data Science can analyze large amounts of medical data, such as patient records, genetic information, and diagnostic images, to identify patterns and indicators that might predict the onset of diseases. Machine learning models can be trained to recognize early signs of diseases like cancer, diabetes, and heart conditions, enabling timely intervention and treatment.
As an experienced Software Developer and Data Scientist, Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning and Data Analytics are the main areas of my current data science research study which focuses on deep learning. Deep learning is a subfield of machine learning that focuses on artificial neural networks and algorithms inspired by the structure and function of the human brain. It involves training deep neural networks with multiple layers to learn and make predictions or decisions from large amounts of data.
Deep learning, a subset of machine learning, has significant research importance in the United States in its application to the health care sector.
Therefore, based on my wealth of experience and demonstrated skills in Software Development and Data Science, my proposed endeavor aims to benefit the United States health industry by utilizing data analytics, artificial intelligence (AI), and machine learning techniques using a variety of data sources, such as electronic health records (EHRs), wearable devices, genetic databases, environmental data, and patient-reported information, to identify people at high risk of developing chronic diseases at an early stage.
To learn more information about me, please visit:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/dele-adelusi
https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Bamidele-Adelusi

title: Welcome to my personal website
text:
I have 15+ years of professional total IT experience in design, develop, build and deployment of Software, Database, Web Applications and 5+ years of hands-on experience in architecting, automating and optimizing mission critical deployments over large infrastructure.
Experience leading development team, building roadmaps, and adopting principles and standards in the design, development, and delivery of solutions.
I am a result-focus professional and that motivates me and gives me joy as I achieve result. My ability to think, deliver and make things happen in any challenging environment. I am always glad for use my skills and produce results. The good team and conducive environment add value as well.
I am a team player. I know how to connect with my team and even share my skills with my team because the more we know, the better our result. If I see anyone, not cooperating, I show empathy then find out any challenge or any assistance I can render, thereafter I share my skills to ensure the team get result.
However, I have long-term goals to become a recognized expert in the Professions – Data Science & Software Development, contribute to transformative industry advancements, and mentor emerging professionals.
To learn more about me, please visit: https://deleadelusi.github.io
